paramagpy.metal¶

Functions¶

euler_to_matrix(eulers) Calculate a rotation matrix from euler angles using ZYZ convention
matrix_to_euler(M) Calculate Euler angles from a rotation matrix using ZYZ convention
unique_eulers(a, b, g)
make_tensor(x, y, z, axial, rhombic, alpha, …) Make a ChiTensor isntance from given parameters.

Classes¶

Metal([position, eulers, axrh, mueff, …]) An object for paramagnetic chi tensors and delta-chi tensors.
